29#ifndef AUTH_H
30#define AUTH_H
31
32#include <signal.h>
33
34#include <openssl/rsa.h>
35
36#ifdef HAVE_LOGIN_CAP
37#include <login_cap.h>
38#endif
39#ifdef BSD_AUTH
40#include <bsd_auth.h>
41#endif
42#ifdef KRB5
43#include <krb5.h>
44#endif
45
46struct passwd;
47struct ssh;
48struct sshbuf;
49struct sshkey;
50struct sshauthopt;
51
52typedef struct Authctxt Authctxt;
53typedef struct Authmethod Authmethod;
54typedef struct KbdintDevice KbdintDevice;
55
56struct Authctxt {
57 sig_atomic_t success;
58 int authenticated; /* authenticated and alarms cancelled */
59 int postponed; /* authentication needs another step */
60 int valid; /* user exists and is allowed to login */
61 int attempt;
62 int failures;
63 int server_caused_failure;
64 int force_pwchange;
65 char *user; /* username sent by the client */
66 char *service;
67 struct passwd *pw; /* set if 'valid' */
68 char *style;
69
70 /* Method lists for multiple authentication */
71 char **auth_methods; /* modified from server config */
72 u_int num_auth_methods;
73
74 /* Authentication method-specific data */
75 void *methoddata;
76 void *kbdintctxt;
77#ifdef BSD_AUTH
78 auth_session_t *as;
79#endif
80#ifdef KRB5
81 krb5_context krb5_ctx;
82 krb5_auth_context krb5_auth_ctx;
83 krb5_ccache krb5_fwd_ccache;
84 krb5_principal krb5_user;
85 char *krb5_ticket_file;
86#endif
87
88 /* Authentication keys already used; these will be refused henceforth */
89 struct sshkey **prev_keys;
90 u_int nprev_keys;
91
92 /* Last used key and ancillary information from active auth method */
93 struct sshkey *auth_method_key;
94 char *auth_method_info;
95
96 /* Information exposed to session */
97 struct sshbuf *session_info; /* Auth info for environment */
98};
99
100/*
101 * Every authentication method has to handle authentication requests for
102 * non-existing users, or for users that are not allowed to login. In this
103 * case 'valid' is set to 0, but 'user' points to the username requested by
104 * the client.
105 */
106
107#ifdef USE_PAM
108#include "auth-pam.h"
109#endif
110
111struct Authmethod {
112 const char *name;
113 int (*userauth)(struct ssh *);
114 int *enabled;
115};
116
117/*
118 * Keyboard interactive device:
119 * init_ctx returns: non NULL upon success
120 * query returns: 0 - success, otherwise failure
121 * respond returns: 0 - success, 1 - need further interaction,
122 * otherwise - failure
123 */
124struct KbdintDevice
125{
126 const char *name;
127 void* (*init_ctx)(Authctxt*);
128 int (*query)(void *ctx, char **name, char **infotxt,
129 u_int *numprompts, char ***prompts, u_int **echo_on);
130 int (*respond)(void *ctx, u_int numresp, char **responses);
131 void (*free_ctx)(void *ctx);
132};
133
134int
135auth_rhosts2(struct passwd *, const char *, const char *, const char *);
136
137int auth_password(struct ssh *, const char *);
138
139int hostbased_key_allowed(struct ssh *, struct passwd *,
140 const char *, char *, struct sshkey *);
141int user_key_allowed(struct ssh *, struct passwd *, struct sshkey *, int,
142 struct sshauthopt **);
143int auth2_key_already_used(Authctxt *, const struct sshkey *);
144
145/*
146 * Handling auth method-specific information for logging and prevention
147 * of key reuse during multiple authentication.
148 */
149void auth2_authctxt_reset_info(Authctxt *);
150void auth2_record_key(Authctxt *, int, const struct sshkey *);
151void auth2_record_info(Authctxt *authctxt, const char *, ...)
152 __attribute__((__format__ (printf, 2, 3)))
153 __attribute__((__nonnull__ (2)));
154void auth2_update_session_info(Authctxt *, const char *, const char *);
155
156#ifdef KRB5
157int auth_krb5(struct ssh *, krb5_data *auth, char **client, krb5_data *);
158int auth_krb5_tgt(Authctxt *authctxt, krb5_data *tgt);
159int auth_krb5_password(Authctxt *authctxt, const char *password);
160void krb5_cleanup_proc(Authctxt *authctxt);
161#endif /* KRB5 */
162
163void do_authentication2(struct ssh *);
164
165void auth_log(struct ssh *, int, int, const char *, const char *);
166void auth_maxtries_exceeded(struct ssh *) __attribute__((noreturn));
167void userauth_finish(struct ssh *, int, const char *, const char *);
168int auth_root_allowed(struct ssh *, const char *);
169
170char *auth2_read_banner(void);
171int auth2_methods_valid(const char *, int);
172int auth2_update_methods_lists(Authctxt *, const char *, const char *);
173int auth2_setup_methods_lists(Authctxt *);
174int auth2_method_allowed(Authctxt *, const char *, const char *);
175
176void privsep_challenge_enable(void);
177
178int auth2_challenge(struct ssh *, char *);
179void auth2_challenge_stop(struct ssh *);
180int bsdauth_query(void *, char **, char **, u_int *, char ***, u_int **);
181int bsdauth_respond(void *, u_int, char **);
182
183int allowed_user(struct ssh *, struct passwd *);
184struct passwd * getpwnamallow(struct ssh *, const char *user);
185
186char *expand_authorized_keys(const char *, struct passwd *pw);
187char *authorized_principals_file(struct passwd *);
188
189FILE *auth_openkeyfile(const char *, struct passwd *, int);
190FILE *auth_openprincipals(const char *, struct passwd *, int);
191int auth_key_is_revoked(struct sshkey *);
192
193const char *auth_get_canonical_hostname(struct ssh *, int);
194
195HostStatus
196check_key_in_hostfiles(struct passwd *, struct sshkey *, const char *,
197 const char *, const char *);
198
199/* hostkey handling */
200struct sshkey *get_hostkey_by_index(int);
201struct sshkey *get_hostkey_public_by_index(int, struct ssh *);
202struct sshkey *get_hostkey_public_by_type(int, int, struct ssh *);
203struct sshkey *get_hostkey_private_by_type(int, int, struct ssh *);
204int get_hostkey_index(struct sshkey *, int, struct ssh *);
205int sshd_hostkey_sign(struct ssh *, struct sshkey *, struct sshkey *,
206 u_char **, size_t *, const u_char *, size_t, const char *);
207
208/* Key / cert options linkage to auth layer */
209const struct sshauthopt *auth_options(struct ssh *);
210int auth_activate_options(struct ssh *, struct sshauthopt *);
211void auth_restrict_session(struct ssh *);
212int auth_authorise_keyopts(struct ssh *, struct passwd *pw,
213 struct sshauthopt *, int, const char *);
214void auth_log_authopts(const char *, const struct sshauthopt *, int);
215
216/* debug messages during authentication */
217void auth_debug_add(const char *fmt,...)
218 __attribute__((format(printf, 1, 2)));
219void auth_debug_send(struct ssh *);
220void auth_debug_reset(void);
221
222void disable_forwarding(void);
223
224struct passwd *fakepw(void);
225
226#define SKEY_PROMPT "\nS/Key Password: "
227
228#if defined(KRB5) && !defined(HEIMDAL)
229#include <krb5.h>
230krb5_error_code ssh_krb5_cc_gen(krb5_context, krb5_ccache *);
231#endif
232#define SSH_SUBPROCESS_STDOUT_DISCARD (1) /* Discard stdout */
233#define SSH_SUBPROCESS_STDOUT_CAPTURE (1<<1) /* Redirect stdout */
234#define SSH_SUBPROCESS_STDERR_DISCARD (1<<2) /* Discard stderr */
235pid_t subprocess(const char *, struct passwd *,
236 const char *, int, char **, FILE **, u_int flags);
237
238#endif
